titles: A new petition to the Kings most Excellent Majestie The humble petition of the knights, gentry, free-holders, of the county of Yorke, who have subscribed hereto: presented to His Majestie at Yorke, April 30, 1642. Desiring a happy union betwixt the King and the Parliament.
publisher: by R.O. and G.D. for Iohn Frank,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Charles --  I, --  King of England, 1600-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
